title: Which are some of the best carnatic songs in Tamil? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is hard for one to choose which songs qualify to be the best. I can just go on and on giving you a list of my favourites. But this is the list of popular compositions in Tamil which are enjoyed by many people. 1. Kurai Ondrum Illai, a Ragamalika2. Alaipayuthey in Kaanada3. Thaaye Yashoda in Todi4. Muraganin Marupeyar Azhagu in Behag5. Jagajjanani in Rathipathipriya6. Yaaro Ivar Yaaro in Bhairavi7. Enneramum Undhan in Devagandhari8. Maa Ramanan in Hindolam9. Kaa Vaa Vaa in Varali10. Naan Oru Vilayattu in Navarasa kannada11. Karpagame in Madhyamavathi12. Sri Chakraraja Simhasaneshwari, a Ragamalika13. Chinnan chiru kiliye,a ragamalika by Bharatiar14. Sabhapathikku Veru Deivam in Abhogi15. Enna Thavam Seidhanai in Kaapi While the fifteen songs I listed are the popular and widely enjoyed, there are myriad compositions which are beautifully composed and have the form that qualifies them to be treated elaborately in concerts. Few of them are popular and few of them are not so popular. I shall list a few of my personal favorite compositions here. This is just a list of songs which are on my mind right now. There are tons of beautiful Tamizh compositions! :)  1. Perinbam Verariyen in Chakravakam, Ambujam Krishna2. Enneramum Oru Kaalai, Thodi, Marimuthu Pillai3. Aadi Kondar, Mayamalavagowla, Muthuthandavar4. Annai Jaanaki Vandale, Shankarabharanam, Arunachala Kavirayar5. Andha Raama Soundharyam, Kedaragowla, Arunachala Kavirayar6. Thaaye Yezhaipal and Thaaye Neeye, in Bhairavi by Papanasam Sivan7. Saravanabhava Guhane in Madhyamavathi, Papanasam Sivan8. Arulvai Angayarkanniye in Dharmavathi by Dandapani Desikar9. Kandhaa Bhakta Chintamani, by Dandapani Desikar10. Devi Neeye Thunai in Keeravani by Papanasam Sivan11. Unnai Allal and Theril Erinan, Kalyani, both by Papanasam Sivan12. Kaana Kan Koti Vendum in Khamboji, Papanasam Sivan13. Kapali in Mohanam, Papanasam Sivan14. Thiruvadi Charanam Endru in Khamboji by Gopalakrishna Bharati15. Gathi Nee Endru, Todi, Ambujam Krishna16. Ini Oru Kanam Unnai, Sriranjani, Papanasam Sivan17. Unnai Nambinenayya, Keeravani, Muthuthandavar18. Anumane Samikkindha, Malayamarutham, Arunachalakavirayar19. Kanaka Vela Karunalavala, Sri Ragam, Koteeswarayar20. Muruga Muruga, Saveri, Periasami Thooran

It's really difficult to rate a few songs as the best, be it in any language.
